        private static int sumOfMultiplicationFrom2Invert(int ignore,
                                                  int... s)
        |1|5|6|7|2|4|6|8|1| |X|Y| = S(Array of Numbers) if ignore == 2: X and Y is ignored |10|9|8|7|6|5|4|3|2| = vector starting with two, arranged in reverse order to multiply | 1*10 | 5*9 | 6*8 | 7*7 | 2*6 | 4*5 | 6*4 | 8*3 | 1*2 | 1* 10 + 5*9 + 6*8 + 7*7 + 2*6 + 4*5 + 6*4 + 8*3 + 1*2 = Return
        Parameters:
        ignore - Number of numbers at the end ignore
        s - Array of Numbers
        Returns:
        Internal product of the vector not ignored by another that ends with 2 and is decreasing
